id: New lines will create extra messages
zh: 新的线条会产生额外的信息
en: New lines will create extra messages

id: Auto color character names in messages
zh: 信息中的字符名称自动着色
en: Auto color character names in messages

id: Propagate input to rest of the Tree
zh: 传播输入到树的其他部分
en: Propagate input to rest of the Tree

id: Dim characters when they are not speaking
zh: 角色不说话的时候会变暗
en: Dim characters when they are not speaking

id: Default bus for Text event audio
zh: 文本事件音频的默认总线
en: Default bus for Text event audio

id: Inputs for text events will be treated as keys for tr()
zh: 文本事件的输入将被视为tr()的按键
en: Inputs for text events will be treated as keys for tr()

id: Save current timeline on timeline start
zh: 在时间轴开始时保存当前的时间轴
en: Save current timeline on timeline start

id: Clear saved timeline on timeline end
zh: 在时间线结束时清除保存的时间线
en: Clear saved timeline on timeline end

zh: 在时间线开始时保存定义
在时间线结束时保存定义

id: The selected operator requires a number!
zh: 所选的操作需要一个数字!
en: The selected operator requires a number!

id: This event needs a question event around it!
zh: 这个事件需要一个围绕它的问题事件!
en: This event needs a question event around it!
